details: LS Abraham, J Pineiro-Maceira, B Duque-Estrada
abstract: We have observed small pinpoint white dots regularly distributed on the scalp of patients with Fitzpatrick skin phototypes V and VI and in sunexposed areas of patients with phototypes III and IV. These structures were seen in normal scalps and …
